scripts.minify-html: html-minifier --input-dir components --output-dir components --file-ext html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true
scripts.minify-js: uglifyjs js/script.js js/navbar.js js/footer.js js/pagination.js -o js/script.min.js
scripts.build: npm run minify-html && npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
